item.title: Add Pyrexp, an online regex tester and visualizer
item.description: https://pythonium.net/regex - Free web-based regex tester and visualizer for debugging regular expressions.

item.title: Fold Requestly to single line
item.description: https://requestly.com/products/session-book/ - Chrome Extension to Intercept, Redirect and Mock HTTP Requests. Featuring [Debugger](https://requestly.com/products/web-debugger/), [Mock Server](https://requestly.com/products/mock-server/), [API Client](https://requestly.com/products/api-client/) and [Session Recording](https://requestly.com/products/session-book/). Redirect URLs, Modify HTTP Headers, Mock APIs, Inject custom JS, Modify GraphQL Requests, Generate Mock API Endpoints, Record session with Network & Console Logs. Create upto 10 rules in Free Tier. Free for open-source.

item.title: Add Requestly
item.description:
https://requestly.com/ -
https://requestly.com/products/web-debugger/ - — Open-source Chrome Extension to Intercept, Redirect and Mock HTTP Requests. Redirect URLs, Modify HTTP Headers, Mock APIs, Inject custom JS, Modify GraphQL Requests. Alternative to Charles Proxy & Fiddler. Free tier include creating upto 5 rules. Completely free for open source projects.
https://requestly.com/products/mock-server/ - — Generate Mock API Endpoints. Define custom HTTP status code & custom headers. Create upto 5 mocks in free tier.
https://requestly.com/products/api-client/ - - Open-source & Web based API Client. Minimal. Free for everyone.
https://requestly.com/products/session-book/ - Open-source Chrome Extension - Session Recording & Replay for Developer & QA teams. Generate Link and Share. Includes Console Logs, Network Logs. Generate Mock APIs directly. Auto-generate bug report via JIRA Issue. Free tier includes upto 10 saved sessions.

item.title: update pdf factory
item.description: https://pdf-api.io - PDF Automation API, visual template editor or HTML to PDF, dynamic data integration, and PDF rendering with an API. The free plan comes with one template, 100 PDFs/month.
